General.Name: JSW Energy Limited
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: JSW Energy Limited generates and sells power in India. The company has a power generation capacity of 6,564 MW, which includes 3,158 MW of thermal, 1,391 MW of hydro, 1,358 of Wind, and 657 MW of solar. It has operations in the States of Karnataka, Maharashtra, Tamil Nadu, Andhra Pradesh, Telangana, Madhya Pradesh, Gujarat, West Bengal, and Rajasthan. It engages in power transmission and trading activities; and coal mining in South Africa. JSW Energy Limited was incorporated in 1994 and is based in Mumbai, India.

9.Name: Mr. Upinder  Singh
9.Title: Chief Operating Officer of Raj WestPower Limited
